summary: This is an email dated August 12, 2019, providing a timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's initial custody and housing status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July 6 to July 23, 2019. It details his arrival, moves between general population, the Special Housing Unit (SHU), and psychological observation, and notes that suicide watch was deemed not warranted on July 9.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; details his arrival at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM/MCC) and subsequent housing and observation status from July 6 to July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Ray Ormond
persons.context: Appears as the sender or a contact referenced in the email attachment (vcf file). The email body is addressed to him or from him regarding Epstein's status.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: Mentioned as being made aware of Epstein's high-profile status after his arrival and indicating that staff were initially unaware of safety concerns.

connections.description: The Warden was responsible for Epstein's custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center and was made aware of his high-profile status and safety concerns.

events.title: Epstein Arrives at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (NYM) in New York on a Saturday and was placed in the Receiving and Discharge area before being moved to general population. Staff were reportedly not initially aware of his high-profile concerns.

events.title: Moved to Special Housing Unit (SHU)
events.description: Epstein was moved to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to concerns for his personal safety in the general population.

events.title: Placed on Psychological Observation
events.description: Upon the return of Psychology Service staff on Monday, Epstein was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation.

events.title: Suicide Watch Deemed Not Warranted
events.description: Psychology Service staff notes reflected that a suicide watch was not warranted for Epstein, though he remained under 24-hour observation.

events.title: Returned to SHU with Cell Mate
events.description: Epstein was returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) with a cell mate, where he remained until July 23, 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 6, 2019, and was initially placed in general population.
Staff at the facility had not been made aware of Epstein's high-profile status or associated safety concerns upon his arrival.
Due to safety concerns, Epstein was moved to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on July 7, 2019, and later to psychological observation on July 8.
On July 9, 2019, Psychology Service staff determined a suicide watch was not warranted for Epstein, though he remained under 24-hour observation.
Epstein was returned to the SHU with a cell mate on July 10, 2019, and remained there until at least July 23, 2019.
